name: funchat-api-gateway
description: FunChat API Gateway - Cloudflare Worker for API key verification, rate limiting, and request routing

scripts.setup:kv: wrangler kv:namespace create API_KEY_CACHE && wrangler kv:namespace create RATE_LIMIT
scripts.setup:secrets: wrangler secret put SUPABASE_URL && wrangler secret put SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY

author: FunChat
